WorkItem.Description:
The "Edit Item Filters" dialog contains only pre-WotLK filters: Sunwell, Tier 6, Tier 5, Tier 4, etc.
 
IF this feature is actually intended to limit the items shown on the item selection lists...
 
Please update them to include Naxx10, Naxx25, etc plus Tier 8, 7.5, 7 items.
I would also suggest including non-heroic and heroic instance filters.
Perhaps even WotLK World Drops vs. TBC World Drops vs. Old World Drops.
WorkItem.Summary: Edit Item Filters - Update for WotLK
